name: snapshot
description: Displays stats for finished NHL games as if they were live.

scripts.build: tsc -p src --outDir ./dist && cpy server/**/*.js ../dist --parents --cwd=src && cpy site/**/*.css site/**/*.woff site/**/*.html site/**/*.png ../dist --parents --cwd=src && npm run build-libs
scripts.build-libs: cpy node_modules/requirejs/require.js dist/libs && cpy node_modules/mustache/mustache.min.js dist/libs
scripts.build-run: npm run build && npm run start-server
scripts.start-all: npm run start-mongodb && npm run start-server

author: Jeff ten Have
